channel.title: New MoparScaper
channel.description:
Hi everybody.
I am a new moperscaper and I have limited knowledege to what I am suppose to do here..
I've downloaded a new moparscape private servers they seem very familiar to runescape 2 for some reason thats why im confused.
Secondly I ran a moparscape server and for some reason I get around 200 players but when I do shout outs no one talks back and im pretty positive people know how to do shout outs as well but no one talks, I don't know if im doing the servers correctly so can someone help me out on this as well.
Another thing for some reason the server stops working after a hour is that normal??
Finally can someone suggest me the best server to get started with.
Thanks yall i'll be sticking around here for some time.
Lates

item.title: New MoparScaper
item.dc:creator: @moparscape4lifez moparscape4lifez
item.description:
@moparscape4lifez wrote:

Ah I see so that SYIpkpkr is related somehow do the 200 players I see so its a bug in the server software.

Oh I couldn’t get Rs2d to run so thats not for me.

Well thank you for the response!

Read full topic

item.title: New MoparScaper
item.dc:creator: @meiscooldude meiscooldude
item.description:
@meiscooldude wrote:

the 200 players are all ‘Null’ players, basically a connection to your server that is ‘fake’…

And yes, many servers tend to stop working after running for so long.

The best server to start out with is Rs2d, But that is a little complicated for beginners.

Read full topic
